title: Foreign Ministers of Baltic states and France meet in Rīga
summary_full: On 15th January, the French Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs, Jean-Noël Barrot, will make a working visit to Latvia, being hosted by the Latvian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, who will also organise a joint meeting with the Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the Baltic States – Lithuania's Kęstutis Budrys and Estonia's Margus Tsahkna.
